evidence.claim: Genius SIS utilizes AWS for cloud services and infrastructure.
The company emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations in their product offerings.
Integration with EHR systems supporting HL7 standards is a core feature of their platform.
Genius SIS has implemented API integrations for various health tech platforms.
Use of Azure is mentioned in their documentation regarding data security and compliance.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found for X12 or clearinghouse use cases on the site.
